page.title: 02NO PUBLIC SWIMMING POOLS...
page.content: There are no public swimming pools but there is Lancing college pool which is open to some people. Further along the A27 is Shoreham airport and across the A27 is Lancing College. Shoreham airport is on the Shoreham and Lancing border and mainly takes light aircraft and has an all weather runway. Last year the Good Year airship was t the airport. Lancing College is an extremly good educational establishment and so is Boundstone Community College,which is one of the secondary schools in the country. Lancing has adequate shopping facilites but they are rather boring for young people.It was reported that Lancing is the biggest village in England but I don't know if it is.
